verses.name: Ezekiel 16:60
verses.text: Nevertheless I will remember my covenant with thee in the days of thy youth, and I will establish unto thee an everlasting covenant.

verses.name: Ezekiel 16:61
verses.text: Then thou shalt remember thy ways, and be ashamed, when thou shalt receive thy sisters, thine elder and thy younger: and I will give them unto thee for daughters, but not by thy covenant.

verses.name: Ezekiel 16:62
verses.text: And I will establish my covenant with thee; and thou shalt know that I am the Lord:
